entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
